DELETE FROM TT_NOITRU_BENHANCHUYENKHOA_CHITIET WHERE BENHAN_ID = $BENHAN_ID$ AND BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
END

INSERT INTO TT_NOITRU_BENHANCHUYENKHOA_CHITIET ( BENHAN_ID , LOAIBENHAN , DATAFIELD , VALUE , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYTAO , BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #BENHAN_ID# , #LOAIBENHAN# , #DATAFIELD# , #VALUE# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYTAO# , #BENHVIEN_ID# )
DELETE FROM TT_NOITRU_BENHANCHUYENKHOA_CHITIET WHERE BENHAN_ID = $BENHAN_ID$ AND BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND LOAIBENHAN='$LOAIBENHAN$'
SELECT * FROM TT_NOITRU_BENHAN where TRANGTHAI = 'DANGDIEUTRI' AND BENHAN_ID = $BENHAN_ID$

SELECT BENHAN_ID, LOAIBENHAN, NGUOITAO_ID, LYDOVAOVIEN, QUATRINHBENHLY, TIENSUBANTHAN, DIUNG, NGAYDIUNG, MATUY, NGAYMATUY, RUOUBIA, NGAYRUOUBIA, THUOCLA, NGAYTHUOCLA, THUOCLAO, NGAYTHUOCLAO , TIENSUKHAC, NGAYTIENSUKHAC, TIENSUGIADINH, KHAMBENHTOANTHAN, MACH , NHIPTHO, NHIETDO, CANNANG, HUYETAPCAO, HUYETAPTHAP, THANKINH, TUANHOAN, HOHAP, TIEUHOA, COXUONGKHOP, TIETNIEU, MAT , TAIMUIHONG, RANGHAMMAT, KHAMBENHKHAC, DAYTHANKINH_SONAO, DAYMAT, VANDONG, TRUONGLUCCO, CAMGIAC, PHANXA, BIEUHIENCHUNG , KHONGGIAN, THOIGIAN, BANTHAN, CAMXUC, TRIGIAC, HINHTHUC, NOIDUNG, HOATDONGCOYCHI, HOATDONGBANNANG , NHOMAYMOC, NHOTHONGHIEU, KHANANGPHANTICH, KHANANGTONGHOP, CHUY, XETNGHIEMCLSCANLAM, TOMTATBENHAN, KHIVAOKHOA_BENHCHINH , KHIVAOKHOA_BENHPHU, KHIVAOKHOA_PHANBIET, KHAMBENHTIENLUONG, HUONGDANDIEUTRI FROM ( select BACT.BENHAN_ID, BACT.LOAIBENHAN, BACT.DATAFIELD, BACT.VALUE, BACT.NGUOITAO_ID, CONVERT(varchar(20), BACT.NGAYTAO, 103) AS NGAYTAO from TT_NOITRU_BENHANCHUYENKHOA_CHITIET BACT where BACT.BENHAN_ID = $BENHAN_ID$ and BACT.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' and BACT.LOAIBENHAN='$LOAIBENHAN_CK$' ) AS derived PIVOT ( MAX(VALUE) FOR DATAFIELD IN ( LYDOVAOVIEN, QUATRINHBENHLY, TIENSUBANTHAN, DIUNG, NGAYDIUNG, MATUY, NGAYMATUY, RUOUBIA, NGAYRUOUBIA, THUOCLA, NGAYTHUOCLA, THUOCLAO, NGAYTHUOCLAO , TIENSUKHAC, NGAYTIENSUKHAC, TIENSUGIADINH, KHAMBENHTOANTHAN, MACH , NHIPTHO, NHIETDO, CANNANG, HUYETAPCAO, HUYETAPTHAP, THANKINH, TUANHOAN, HOHAP, TIEUHOA, COXUONGKHOP, TIETNIEU, MAT , TAIMUIHONG, RANGHAMMAT, KHAMBENHKHAC, DAYTHANKINH_SONAO, DAYMAT, VANDONG, TRUONGLUCCO, CAMGIAC, PHANXA, BIEUHIENCHUNG , KHONGGIAN, THOIGIAN, BANTHAN, CAMXUC, TRIGIAC, HINHTHUC, NOIDUNG, HOATDONGCOYCHI, HOATDONGBANNANG , NHOMAYMOC, NHOTHONGHIEU, KHANANGPHANTICH, KHANANGTONGHOP, CHUY, XETNGHIEMCLSCANLAM, TOMTATBENHAN, KHIVAOKHOA_BENHCHINH , KHIVAOKHOA_BENHPHU, KHIVAOKHOA_PHANBIET, KHAMBENHTIENLUONG, HUONGDANDIEUTRI ) ) AS p

INSERT INTO TT_NOITRU_BENHANCHUYENKHOA_CHITIET ( BENHAN_ID , LOAIBENHAN , DATAFIELD , VALUE , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYTAO , BENHVIEN_ID ) values ( #BENHAN_ID# , #LOAIBENHAN# , #DATAFIELD# , #VALUE# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYTAO# , #BENHVIEN_ID# )

IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TT_NOITRU_BENHANCHUYENKHOA_CHITIET WHERE BENHAN_ID = $BENHAN_ID$ AND BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$') BEGIN
